name: Adhesion Boots
content:
Description

Crafted of an ultra-durable leather to ensure they support the wearer's weight, these boots possess bioengineered nanofiber soles that adhere flawlessly to any surface they touch until deactivated.

Special

These boots enable their wearer to automatically succeed at all rolls that pertain to climbing, and magically affixes them to the surface they're climbing on, even while upside down. Because the affixion is mechanical, no action is required to sustain the effect, and an unconscious wearer still remains affixed.

data.data-description: Crafted of an ultra-durable leather to ensure they support the wearer's weight, these boots possess bioengineered nanofiber soles that adhere flawlessly to any surface they touch until deactivated.
data.data-special: These boots enable their wearer to automatically succeed at all rolls that pertain to climbing, and magically affixes them to the surface they're climbing on, even while upside down. Because the affixion is mechanical, no action is required to sustain the effect, and an unconscious wearer still remains affixed.

name: Adrenal Biomod
content: Those willing to undergo the invasive procedure will thank themselves the next time they take a bullet in the heat of battle and their biomod compensates for the pain with an automatic adrenaline pump.

data.data-description: Those willing to undergo the invasive procedure will thank themselves the next time they take a bullet in the heat of battle and their biomod compensates for the pain with an automatic adrenaline pump.

name: Aegis of Warding
content:
Description

These magical glyphs are usually created to guard items of power. While diverse in pattern and style, they are usually ornately designed and appear as art objects affixed to a wall until triggered.

Special

Once activated and affixed to a surface, an Aegis of Warding cannot be moved. A successful removal destroys it in the process. In addition, all damage dealt by the Aegis is lethal damage.

data.data-description: These magical glyphs are usually created to guard items of power. While diverse in pattern and style, they are usually ornately designed and appear as art objects affixed to a wall until triggered.
data.data-special: Once activated and affixed to a surface, an Aegis of Warding cannot be moved. A successful removal destroys it in the process. In addition, all damage dealt by the Aegis is lethal damage.

name: Assassin's Rifle
content: This weapon has the Baneful (Blinded) and Baneful (Persistent Damage) properties. However, certain conditions must be met to use these properties. If your target is off guard, unaware, or within melee range of one of your allies, you can use the Baneful proprety.

data.data-description: This weapon has the Baneful (Blinded) and Baneful (Persistent Damage) properties. However, certain conditions must be met to use these properties. If your target is off guard, unaware, or within melee range of one of your allies, you can use the Baneful proprety.

name: Black Lotus Extract
content: Of those who dabble in such dark secrets, no poison is more feared than that extracted from the petals of the black lotus.

data.data-description: Of those who dabble in such dark secrets, no poison is more feared than that extracted from the petals of the black lotus.

name: Blowfish Venom
content: With just a drop in an unattended goblet or a liberal dose on the edge of a blade, this poison renders its target completely immobile and incapable of escape.

data.data-description: With just a drop in an unattended goblet or a liberal dose on the edge of a blade, this poison renders its target completely immobile and incapable of escape.

name: Book of Shadow
content:
Description

Bound in a black substance harvested from the demiplane of shadow, this ancient tome contains secret words that allow one to manipulate the darkness, and even summon shadowy creatures from otherworldly planes of existence.

Special

Calling upon the power of the Book of Shadows is draining to normal mortals. Every time a creature successfully uses this item to invoke a bane or boon of power level 5 or above, they must make a Will roll of CR 15 or suffer one level of the *fatigued* bane.

data.data-description: Bound in a black substance harvested from the demiplane of shadow, this ancient tome contains secret words that allow one to manipulate the darkness, and even summon shadowy creatures from otherworldly planes of existence.
data.data-special: Calling upon the power of the Book of Shadows is draining to normal mortals. Every time a creature successfully uses this item to invoke a bane or boon of power level 5 or above, they must make a Will roll of CR 15 or suffer one level of the *fatigued* bane.

name: Cerebral Probe
content:
Description

A mechanical apparatus of metal plates, leather straps, and buckles, this device has a cone-shaped metal protrusion that is inserted into the subject's ear and flares out like a phonograph. Once secured, the subject's darkest secrets are thence played like a classic tune from a vinyl record.

Special

This apparatus must be carefully secured to the target. As such the target must first be unconscious, helpless, or immobile before a the *mind dredge* attack can be made. As long as the target is afflicted by a bane from this item, they are automatically inflicted with the *immobile* bane until the first bane ceases.

data.data-description: A mechanical apparatus of metal plates, leather straps, and buckles, this device has a cone-shaped metal protrusion that is inserted into the subject's ear and flares out like a phonograph. Once secured, the subject's darkest secrets are thence played like a classic tune from a vinyl record.

As long as the target is afflicted by a bane from this item, they are automatically inflicted with the *immobile* bane until the first bane ceases.

name: Collar of Choking
content:
Description

This plain steel collar will choke the life out of anyone who wears it.

Special

This apparatus must be carefully secured to the target. As such the target must first be unconscious, helpless, or immobile before a the *mind dredge* attack can be made. As long as the target is afflicted by a bane from this item, they are automatically inflicted with the *immobile* bane until the first bane ceases.

data.data-description: This plain steel collar will choke the life out of anyone who wears it.
data.data-special: This apparatus must be carefully secured to the target. As such the target must first be unconscious, helpless, or immobile before a the *mind dredge* attack can be made. As long as the target is afflicted by a bane from this item, they are automatically inflicted with the *immobile* bane until the first bane ceases.

name: Colt 45
content: With its smooth and ornately carved ivory handle, this marvel of frontier ingenuity is the only protection a gunfighter needs.

data.data-description: With its smooth and ornately carved ivory handle, this marvel of frontier ingenuity is the only protection a gunfighter needs.

name: Crystal Ball
content: No mystic should go without this quintessential tool for peering beyond the limits of normal sight.

data.data-description: No mystic should go without this quintessential tool for peering beyond the limits of normal sight.

name: Digital Camouflage
content: This specialized digital outerwear is used by elite black ops specialists on ultra-secret espionage missions. 360 degrees of camera coverage feeds dynamic digital concealment which is projected on the suit's exterior.

data.data-description: This specialized digital outerwear is used by elite black ops specialists on ultra-secret espionage missions. 360 degrees of camera coverage feeds dynamic digital concealment which is projected on the suit's exterior.

name: Dotanuki
content: This exceptionally crafted katana is far heavier than the average blade of its type, bringing far more force to bear on its razor edge blade. A Dotanuki is known to cut foes in two.

data.data-description: This exceptionally crafted katana is far heavier than the average blade of its type, bringing far more force to bear on its razor edge blade. A Dotanuki is known to cut foes in two.

name: Explosive Ammo
content: These special incendiary rounds ignite on impact, wreathing your quarry in a gout of flame.

data.data-description: These special incendiary rounds ignite on impact, wreathing your quarry in a gout of flame.

name: Firebrand
content: A longsword with a golden hilt. Along the blade are runes of power that burn red at all times. Upon command, the sword erupts in flame.

data.data-description: A longsword with a golden hilt. Along the blade are runes of power that burn red at all times. Upon command, the sword erupts in flame.

name: Frostblight
content:
Description

Freezing to the touch and engraved with wintry patterns of arcane magic, this suit of plate mail emits an aura of frost that halts foes in their tracks.

Special

Frostblight can only invoke the immobile bane via its persistent aura.

data.data-description: Freezing to the touch and engraved with wintry patterns of arcane magic, this suit of plate mail emits an aura of frost that halts foes in their tracks.
data.data-special: Frostblight can only invoke the *immobile* bane via its persistent aura.

name: Ghostfire
content: This white alchemical liquid ignites in fire as soon as it is exposed to air. Typically, it is sealed tightly in a glass flask or orb meant to be shattered against a foe.

data.data-description: This white alchemical liquid ignites in fire as soon as it is exposed to air. Typically, it is sealed tightly in a glass flask or orb meant to be shattered against a foe.

name: Helm of Goblin Bane
content: At the beginning of their turn, the wearer of this helm may take a free action to make a bane attack against all goblinoids within 100' who can see the helm. The item makes the following attack: Fear 5 versus Resolve.

data.data-description: At the beginning of their turn, the wearer of this helm may take a free action to make a bane attack against all goblinoids within 100' who can see the helm. The item makes the following attack: Fear 5 versus Resolve.

name: Helm of Truth
content: This shining jeweled helm fills the wielder's heart with a sense of courage, truth, and justice. Though, some say it imbues just a bit too much of the truth, as the wearer finds themself completely unable to tell a lie.

data.data-description: This shining jeweled helm fills the wielder's heart with a sense of courage, truth, and justice. Though, some say it imbues just a bit too much of the truth, as the wearer finds themself completely unable to tell a lie.

name: Horn of Thunder
content:
Description

When blown, this horn creates a sound wave strong enough to deafen creatures and shatter objects.

Special

The wielder can blow this horn as a major action to make an area attack targeting a 20' cone. The attack is Might 5 versus Toughness. Creatures in the area who are hit by the attack suffer the deafened (power level 4) and knock down (power level 1) banes. Unattended objects in the area, such as doors or locked chests, are instead subject to a damaging attack that deals double damage. The horn can be blown once per day at no cost. Every time it is blown after that, there is a 25% chance that it shatters to pieces.

data.data-description: When blown, this horn creates a sound wave strong enough to deafen creatures and shatter objects.
data.data-special: The wielder can blow this horn as a major action to make an area attack targeting a 20' cone. The attack is Might 5 versus Toughness. Creatures in the area who are hit by the attack suffer the *deafened* (power level 4) and *knock down* (power level 1) banes. Unattended objects in the area, such as doors or locked chests, are instead subject to a damaging attack that deals double damage. The horn can be blown once per day at no cost. Every time it is blown after that, there is a 25% chance that it shatters to pieces.

name: Hydraulic Propulsion Implants
content: You always count as having a running start for your jumps, and your distance covered when jumping is doubled.

data.data-description: You always count as having a running start for your jumps, and your distance covered when jumping is doubled.

name: Jet Pack
content: A masterpiece of technology, the jet pack allows those daring enough to use it to take to the skies with the maneuverability of a hummingbird.

data.data-description: A masterpiece of technology, the jet pack allows those daring enough to use it to take to the skies with the maneuverability of a hummingbird.

name: Lamp of Wishes
content:
Description

When rubbed, this dusty old lamp spews forth an ancient genie of unimaginable power, ready to do the owner’s bidding. However, the genie’s services are often served with a bit of mischief on the side.

Special

Wishes: The genie will grant the owner of the lamp 3 wishes. The genie will often twist or interpret wishes in such a way that the owner gets what they asked for in a completely unfavorable way. For example, if a person wishes to be king of the realm, the genie may transport him upon the throne 1000 years into the future, where the kingdom is a desolate wasteland. Once the lamp has been claimed, a new owner cannot be had until all three wishes are used. After all three wishes have expired, the lamp transports to a completely random point in the world.

data.data-description: When rubbed, this dusty old lamp spews forth an ancient genie of unimaginable power, ready to do the owner’s bidding. However, the genie’s services are often served with a bit of mischief on the side.
data.data-special: [{"Wishes": "The genie will grant the owner of the lamp 3 wishes. The genie will often twist or interpret wishes in such a way that the owner gets what they asked for in a completely unfavorable way. For example, if a person wishes to be king of the realm, the genie may transport him upon the throne 1000 years into the future, where the kingdom is a desolate wasteland. Once the lamp has been claimed, a new owner cannot be had until all three wishes are used. After all three wishes have expired, the lamp transports to a completely random point in the world."}]

name: Laser Cannon
content: This laser gun turret unleashes a massive beam of highly charged photons to decimate foes. Its immense power is balanced by the time it takes to recharge after each use.

data.data-description: This laser gun turret unleashes a massive beam of highly charged photons to decimate foes. Its immense power is balanced by the time it takes to recharge after each use.

name: Maul of Dominance
content:
Description

This massive two-handed hammer is etched with elegant patterns that indicate its value. When held, it pulses with a power felt by all nearby, emitting an aura of menace that draws the attention foes.

Special

The maul's aura boon can only emit the provoked bane. During the first round of combat, its aura can be invoked as a minor action.

data.data-description: This massive two-handed hammer is etched with elegant patterns that indicate its value. When held, it pulses with a power felt by all nearby, emitting an aura of menace that draws the attention foes.
data.data-special: The maul's aura boon can only emit the provoked bane. During the first round of combat, its aura can be invoked as a minor action.

name: Phase Rifle
content: This sleek 30th Century rifle is built for deadshot accuracy at ranges where natural eyes can't even see. Delivering a single burst payload of pure energy means that it is completely silent and without recoil.

data.data-description: This sleek 30th Century rifle is built for deadshot accuracy at ranges where natural eyes can't even see. Delivering a single burst payload of pure energy means that it is completely silent and without recoil.

name: Plasmablade
content:
Description

This regal weapon features a compact hilt made of non-conducting carbon fiber. When activated, a blade of infinitely hot plasma emerges, along with dome-shaped force-field for a hand guard.

Special

When an attack with the plasmablade exceeds the target's defense by 10 or more, the attack severs the target's limb completely and all damage from the attack is lethal. Furthermore, the target is suffers *demoralized* (power level 3) for the remainder of the combat and the effect can't be canceled.

data.data-description: This regal weapon features a compact hilt made of non-conducting carbon fiber. When activated, a blade of infinitely hot plasma emerges, along with dome-shaped force-field for a hand guard.
data.data-special: When an attack with the plasmablade exceeds the target's defense by 10 or more, the attack severs the target's limb  completely and all damage from the attack is lethal. Furthermore, the target is suffers *demoralized* (power level 3) for the remainder of the combat and the effect can't be canceled.

name: Potion of Major Healing
content: A deeper blue and larger flask than its weaker cousin, this alchemical concoction can close even grievous wounds.

data.data-description: A deeper blue and larger flask than its weaker cousin, this alchemical concoction can close even grievous wounds.

name: Potion of Minor Healing
content: This small flask of viscous blue liquid can heal minor wounds in moments when consumed or applied topically.

data.data-description: This small flask of viscous blue liquid can heal minor wounds in moments when consumed or applied topically.

name: Rocket Launcher
content:
Whether outfitted on a mech unit or launched via a soldier's shoulder mount, this anti-air and anti-tank missile can stop just about anything.

Special

This is an Extreme Ranged weapon with the Precise, Delayed Ready, Heavy, Area (15' cube) properties, and the Persistent Damage, Stunned, and Forced Move banes. The *expendable* property applies to the ammo. Each shot uses single extraordinary item.

data.data-description: Whether outfitted on a mech unit or launched via a soldier's shoulder mount, this anti-air and anti-tank missile can stop just about anything.
data.data-special: This is an Extreme Ranged weapon with the Precise, Delayed Ready, Heavy, Area (15' cube) properties, and the Persistent Damage, Stunned, and Forced Move banes. The *expendable* property applies to the ammo. Each shot uses single extraordinary item.

name: Rod of Fear
content: This short rod is crafted of human bone and bears the skull of a screaming human at its head.

data.data-description: This short rod is crafted of human bone and bears the skull of a screaming human at its head.

name: Shining Shield
content: Once per round, when the wielder of this shield is subject to a melee attack, they may make a blinded bane attack against the attacker. The item makes the following attack: Blinded 5 versus Guard.

data.data-description: Once per round, when the wielder of this shield is subject to a melee attack, they may make a *blinded* bane attack against the attacker. The item makes the following attack: Blinded 5 versus Guard.

name: Sleeping Gas
content: Some grenades blow your enemies to bits. This one is for those who prefer the more subtle approach.

data.data-description: Some grenades blow your enemies to bits. This one is for those who prefer the more subtle approach.

name: Soul Siphon
content: This thin black wand emits crackling green necrotic energy capable of draining the very souls from your foes.

data.data-description: This thin black wand emits crackling green necrotic energy capable of draining the very souls from your foes.

name: Spyglass of Farsight
content: A product steampunk innovation, this masterfully crafted spyglass grants its user the sight of an eagle.

data.data-description: A product steampunk innovation, this masterfully crafted spyglass grants its user the sight of an eagle.

name: Staff of the Archmage
content:
Description

Carved from the oak of the World Tree and set with gems from the elemental planes, this staff is one of the most powerful additions to an evoker’s arsenal.

Special

Retributive Strike: The wielder may willingly break the staff to unleash its power in a devastating blast of elemental energy. The wielder is immediately killed, and creatures within 100 feet suffer a damaging attack as follows: 1d20 + 4d8, advantage 9 versus Guard.

data.data-description: Carved from the oak of the World Tree and set with gems from the elemental planes, this staff is one of the most powerful additions to an evoker’s arsenal.
data.data-special: [{"Retributive Strike": "The wielder may willingly break the staff to unleash its power in a devastating blast of elemental energy. The wielder is immediately killed, and creatures within 100 feet suffer a damaging attack as follows: 1d20 + 4d8, advantage 9 versus Guard."}]

name: Time Machine
content:
Description

The ultimate achievement of mad scientists and quantum physicists alike, this vehicle is capable of transporting its passengers through the fourth dimension.

Special

Time Travel: A character may attempt to travel forward or backward in time by making a Logic roll, CR 20. The roll incurs disadvantage 1 for every 5 years of time travel. Any passengers within the vehicle are also transported, willing or not. The GM may interpret a failed roll in any number of interesting ways, including but not limited to the following: * The time travelled is multiplied by 100. * The machine instead transports the passengers to a different dimension. * The direction of time travel is reversed. * The travelers miss the mark by 2d4 years. * The travelers are attacked by a horde of 4th dimensional chrono beasts.

data.data-description: The ultimate achievement of mad scientists and quantum physicists alike, this vehicle is capable of transporting its passengers through the fourth dimension.
data.data-special:
[{"Time Travel": "A character may attempt to travel forward or backward in time by making a Logic roll, CR 20. The roll incurs disadvantage 1 for every 5 years of time travel. Any passengers within the vehicle are also transported, willing or not. The GM may interpret a failed roll in any number of interesting ways, including but not limited to the following:

*  The time travelled is multiplied by 100.
*  The machine instead transports the passengers to a different dimension.
*  The direction of time travel is reversed.
*  The travelers miss the mark by 2d4 years.
*  The travelers are attacked by a horde of 4th dimensional chrono beasts."}]

name: Transmogrification Ray
content: A favorite of mad scientists everywhere, this gun fires a purple ray of energy capable of polymorphing the target into any number of wretched creatures.

data.data-description: A favorite of mad scientists everywhere, this gun fires a purple ray of energy capable of polymorphing the target into any number of wretched creatures.

name: Universal Access Implant
content:
Description

This implant is a coveted tool, gifted by the Intergalactic Alliance to their most trusted agents. For a resourceful user, it unlocks infinite doors. If not for the built-in AI monitoring your every move, it would priceless.

Special

The UAI can only be removed by (illegal) surgery. The wielder always scans affirmatively as a high ranking government official, making them more persuasive via their rank. In addition, the UAI confers a wealth score of 6 for local purchases. Lastly, the device records every action performed by the user and transmits it to the creator. It has Perception 5, applied only to the user's thoughts and actions. If the user fails a contested roll to conceal their intentions, the device will secretly send out an alert and attempt to persuade the user to alter their course of action.

data.data-description: This implant is a coveted tool, gifted by the Intergalactic Alliance to their most trusted agents. For a resourceful user, it unlocks infinite doors. If not for the built-in AI monitoring your every move, it would priceless.
data.data-special: The UAI can only be removed by (illegal) surgery. The wielder always scans affirmatively as a high ranking government official, making them more persuasive via their rank. In addition, the UAI confers a wealth score of 6 for local purchases. Lastly, the device records every action performed by the user and transmits it to the creator. It has Perception 5, applied only to the user's thoughts and actions. If the user fails a contested roll to conceal their intentions, the device will secretly send out an alert and attempt to persuade the user to alter their course of action.

name: Void Cannon
content: This universe shattering weapon of far future technology can literally tear holes in space time. When fired at full charge, the Void Cannon tears a rift in the fabric of spacetime, manifesting as a concentrated beam of annihilation that wipes from existence anything in its path.

data.data-description: This universe shattering weapon of far future technology can literally tear holes in space time. When fired at full charge, the Void Cannon tears a rift in the fabric of spacetime, manifesting as a concentrated beam of annihilation that wipes from existence anything in its path.

name: Worker Bot
content: This pint-sized mechanical creature is made up of quite the array of moving parts, covered in gears, knobs, and fans. While not always perfect in comprehension, it's a useful assistant for day-to-day engineering tasks.

data.data-description: This pint-sized mechanical creature is made up of quite the array of moving parts, covered in gears, knobs, and fans. While not always perfect in comprehension, it's a useful assistant for day-to-day engineering tasks.
